Review: Amazing experience! If you thought a gourmet bakery will leave you hungry, think again. You should skip several meals before visiting here. Everything is so tasty, you cannot restraint yourself from having all of the cookies.

This place is great! Atmosphere is chill and cool but the staff is also really friendly. They know what they’re doing and what they’re talking about, and you can tell making the customers happy is their main priority.
The cookies are absolutely amazing, especially the oatmeal raisin, it melted in my mouth.
Absolutely wonderful. Hands-down the best snickerdoodles I've ever tasted.
